name.ja: バック・トゥ・ザ☆フュージョン

requirement.en: You have 2 or more face-up monsters with the same name on your field.

effect.en: Add 1 "Fusion" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you have 2 or more Normal Monsters with the same name in your Graveyard, you can add 1 of them to your hand.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
